I'm currently studying at **Pontifical Javeriana University**. At the same time, I truly enjoy learning about new technologies and working on personal projects.

- üß† As chairman of the **ACM Chapter Javeriana**, I'm focused on helping my university community acquire new knowledge in computer science. Our motto is *"Attitude is the key!"*, and we truly believe it makes all the difference.
- üìö In my free time, I enjoy reading, problem-solving, listening to music, and spending time with friends and family.
- ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî• What fulfills me is teaching, helping others, and working on my personal growth.
- üèÜ One of my main goals is to participate in the **ICPC** and represent my university with pride.

Thank you for visiting!
